# GitHub Discussions Setup

GitHub Discussions is currently disabled for this repository. To enable it:

## Enable Discussions

1. Go to repository Settings: https://github.com/LGDiMaggio/predictive-maintenance-mcp/settings
2. Scroll down to "Features" section
3. Check âœ… "Discussions"
4. Click "Set up discussions"
5. GitHub will create initial discussion categories

Once enabled, configure these categories:

- **ğŸ’¡ Ideas** - Feature requests and enhancement proposals
- **ğŸ™ Q&A** - Questions and answers about usage

- **ğŸ› Bug Reports** - Issue discussion before filing
- **ğŸ“ Show and Tell** - Share your diagnostic results
- **ğŸ“š Documentation** - Docs improvements

- âœ… Separate Q&A from Issues (keeps issue tracker clean)
- âœ… Community engagement (increases project visibility)

Note: Only repository owner can enable Discussions in Settings.
